channel.title: CVE Feed for Akana -- Akana API Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akana -- Akana API Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-3826|2024-08-14T14:14:05.527Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: In versions of Akana in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3 validation is broken when using the SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-5249|2024-08-01T21:03:11.124Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: In versions of Akana API Platform prior to 2024.1.0, SAML tokens can be replayed.

item.title: CVE-2024-5250|2024-08-01T21:03:11.081Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: In versions of Akana API Platform prior to 2024.1.0 overly verbose errors can be found in SAML integrations

item.description: In versions of Akana API Platform prior to 2024.1.0, SAML tokens can be replayed.

item.title: CVE-2024-3930|2024-07-30T18:36:18.443Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: In versions of Akana API Platform prior to 2024.1.0 a flaw resulting in XML External Entity (XXE) was discovered.

item.title: CVE-2024-2796|2024-08-02T14:44:15.693Z -- akana -- akana%20api%20platform
item.description: A server-side request forgery (SSRF) was discovered in the Akana API Platform in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3. Reported by Jakob Antonsson.
